thesis: Direct divine experience through devoted practice in any faith reveals the one divine reality.

claims.text: Sincere devotion in any faith can lead to the same God.
Direct divine experience transcends religious boundaries.

practice.name: Devotional practice
steps: Choose your preferred form of God

care_notes: Focus on direct experience over dogma

sources.title: Swami Nikhilananda, The Gospel of Sri Ramakrishna (1942)
Swami Saradananda, Sri Ramakrishna and His Divine Play (1919)

ai.synopsis: 19th-century Bengali mystic who taught that devoted practice in any faith reveals one divine reality.

qa_pairs.q: What did he teach about religions?
qa_pairs.a: That sincere devotion in any faith can lead to the same God.

seo.summary: Bengali mystic (1836–1886) emphasizing direct divine experience and the unity of religions.
